title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at the first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item on the first attempt. The focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view. This behavior occurs consistently.

Steps to reproduce:1. Open the library outline view.2. Add a label to the library file.3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.4. Notice that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of allowing the label to be selected.
OB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node.
EB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, the selected item should receive the focus and remain selected.
SR: 1. Open the library outline view.2. Add a label to the library file.3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.4. Observe if the label item is successfully selected without the focus jumping to the library file node.
